ai-tha-ap120:1.4_0: they who are blind and delivers.
ai-tha-ap120:3.1_0: Stepping off her sandals in front of me,
ai-tha-ap120:4.1_0: Though this sacrifice has been given up,
ai-tha-ap120:4.2_0: the world doesn’t stay in the world.
ai-tha-ap120:5.1_0: Not by means of the dispensation,
ai-tha-ap120:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap120:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable senior venerable junior.
ai-tha-ap120:8.1_0: the eighth training of the senior monks.
